items.title: Salesforce (CRM) Expands PayPal Integration with Agentforce Platform Upgrade
items.description: Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is one of the 12 stocks that will make you rich in 10 years. On June 23, the company announced an enhanced collaboration with PayPal (NASDAQ:PYPL) through the Salesforce Agentforce platform. Specifically, users can now integrate PayPal as a featured Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server on Agentforce’s AgentExchange platform. The partnership enables […]

items.title: Morgan Stanley Remains a Buy on Salesforce (CRM) With a PT of $404
items.description: Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is one of the 13 Best Long Term Growth Stocks to Invest in Right Now. In a report released on June 24, Keith Weiss from Morgan Stanley maintained a Buy rating on Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) with a price target of $404.00. The analyst supported the optimistic sentiment with the company’s potential for future […]
